forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow showers developing in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow showers developing in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix early. Then precipitation will transition to a mix of light rain and freezing rain late. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of winter precipitation in the evening will transition to a mixture of light rain and freezing rain late. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.
